title: verify_multisource_anime_streaming_functionality
description: Test the streaming functionality from multiple anime sources through the extension architecture to ensure seamless playback without errors.

title: validate_library_management_features
description: Verify the ability to add anime to favorites, organize them into categories, and manage the library effectively.

title: test_global_and_source_specific_search
description: Ensure the global search bar queries all installed streaming sources simultaneously and returns accurate results.

title: check_tracker_integration_and_sync
description: Validate integration with tracking services like MyAnimeList and AniList, ensuring automatic synchronization of watch progress and status.

title: verify_download_and_offline_viewing_capabilities
description: Test downloading episodes with multi-threaded support and verify offline viewing functionality without errors.

title: validate_advanced_video_player_features
description: Test the MPV-based video player for gesture controls, haptic feedback, custom playback speeds, and torrent streaming support.

title: test_torrent_support_functionality
description: Verify the TorrentServer component's ability to handle torrent streaming and content consumption correctly.

title: verify_backup_and_restore_functionality
description: Test the backup and restore procedures to ensure user data, settings, and progress are preserved accurately and reliably.

title: validate_ui_theme_customization_and_persistence
description: Ensure UI themes apply properly, customization options work as expected, and settings persist across app sessions.

title: check_performance_and_ui_rendering_stability
description: Verify no duplicate key crashes during list rendering and maintain frame time below 16 milliseconds for smooth 60fps animation.
